attributes.action: Reduce amount of homework for teens aged 13-17
attributes.background: We should reduce the amount of homework for teens ages 13-17 as homework deadlines and confusing tasks with no help avaliable is stressful.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:  
 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/109490
 
You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
